      • getChannel

        public static org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.Channel getChannel(java.lang.String chan)
                                                     throws org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.InvalidArgumentException,
                                                            org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.TransactionException
        Get or initialize the channel
        the client must be bind with a user context first via `client.setUserContext(User)`.
        参数:
        chan - Channel
        返回:
        Initialized channel
        抛出:
        org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.InvalidArgumentException
        org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.TransactionException

      • initChannel

                                                      throws org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.InvalidArgumentException,
                                                             org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.TransactionException
        Force refresh the channel
        the client must be bind with a user context first via `client.setUserContext(User)`.
        参数:
        chan - Channel
        返回:
        Initialized channel
        抛出:
        org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.InvalidArgumentException

      • query

        public static java.lang.String query(java.lang.String ch,
                                     java.lang.String cc,
                                     java.lang.String fn,
                                     java.lang.String[] args)
                              throws org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.InvalidArgumentException,
                                     org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.ProposalException,
                                     org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.TransactionException
        Query chaincode, do not write
        参数:
        ch - Channel
        cc - ChainCode
        fn - Function
        args - Args
        返回:
        Response
        抛出:
        org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.InvalidArgumentException
        org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.ProposalException
        org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.TransactionException

      • invoke

        public static boolean invoke(java.lang.String ch,
                             java.lang.String cc,
                             java.lang.String fn,
                             java.lang.String[] args,
                             java.lang.StringBuilder txid)
                      throws org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.ProposalException,
                             org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.InvalidArgumentException,
                             org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.TransactionException
        Invoke chaincode synchronously
        参数:
        ch - Channel
        cc - ChainCode
        fn - Function
        args - Args
        txid - Return the transaction ID
        返回:
        successful or not
        抛出:
        org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.ProposalException
        org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.InvalidArgumentException
        org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.TransactionException

        Invoke chaincode asynchronously
        use `.get` to get the result
        参数:
        ch - Channel
        cc - ChainCode
        fn - Function
        args - Args
        返回:
        The future of transaction event
        抛出:
